attributes.action: Officially ban businesses opening, so they can claim on their insurance.
attributes.additional_details: Businesses are prevented from claiming on their insurance for interruption of Business, unless HM's government officially bans them from opening. The Prime Minister has advised against using such businesses which will result in a huge loss of income. Ensure the government do the right thing.
attributes.background: Officially ban businesses such as pubs and restaurants from opening, so that they can claim for business interruption, following a government mandate.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs, restaurants and non-essential shops are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
